lines.gurmukhi: crn kml gur jb qy irdY bswey qb qy AsiQir iciq Anq n DwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kamal Gur Jab Tay Ridai Basaaay , Tab Tay Asadiri Chiti Anat N Dhaavahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Since the time a human being attaches his mind with the lotus like feet of the True Guru, his mind becomes stable and it does not wander anywhere.

lines.gurmukhi: crn kml mkrMd crnwmiRq kY pRwpiq Amr pd shij smwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kamal Makarand Charanaamrit Kai , Praapati Amar Pad Sahaji Samaavahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The refuge of the True Guru's feet provides one with the foot-wash of the True Guru that helps him acquire inimitable state and engrossment in equipoise.

lines.gurmukhi: crn kml gur jb qy iDAwn Dwry Awn igAwn iDAwn srbMg ibsrwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kamal Gur Jab Tay Dhiaan Dhaaray , Aan Giaan Dhiaan Sarabang Bisaraavahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Since the holy feet of the True Guru got lodged in the heart of a devotee (the devotee took His refuge), the mind of the devotee has shed all other comforts and is absorbed in the meditation of His name.

lines.gurmukhi: crn kml gur mDup Aau kml giq mn mnsw Qikq inj giH AwveI ]218]
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kamal Gur Madhoup Au Kamal Gati , Man Manasaa Dakit Nij Grahi Aavaee ?218?

Shabad OS B.translation: Since the fragrance of the holy lotus-feet of the True Guru got lodged in the mind of the devotee, all other fragrances have become prosaic and indifferent for him. (218)
